title: *NO FEES* 3 Bedroom, Office, Garage Parking, Outdoor Space-September 1
neighborhood: Brighton, Brookline, B Line, BC, BU, Medical Center
map_address: Colborne road near Commonwealth Ave./ Washington St.
posting_body: ['Very spacious unit in two-family Brick house on quiet residential street with private yard.', 'Huge open living and separate dining room.', 'Prime location to Boston College students.', 'Street: Colborne Rd.', 'Rent: $3,500 / Month', 'Beds: 3.5 Office', 'Bath: 2', 'Spacious Living Room and Dining Room', 'Extra space can be opened if needed up.', '(additional 1000 sq ft)', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Parking: Garage Parking Available For Additional Fee', 'Location:', '• 5 minute B line to Boston College.', '•10 minute B line to Boston University.', "•10 minute walk to St. Elizabeth's Medical Center.", '•15 minutes to Harvard (Cambridge) on Bus 86.', '•20 minute bike ride to MIT.', '•35 minute train to downtown.', '•20 minute bus (Copley Express) to Copley Square.', '•Walking distance to Brookline.', 'Features:', '‣Brick House', '‣Yard', '‣Dishwasher', '‣Laundry in basement', '‣Hardwood Floors', '‣Pet free (small pets are negotiable)', '‣Spacious Pantry', '‣Water included, tenant pays for all other utilities.', '(Gas Heating)', 'Required To Move-', 'In:', 'First month, last month, and security deposit.', 'Credit Score check required.', 'Please text \u202a(617) 952-4418\u202c, Irene.']
